text: Mr Hamilton@Guid mornin cless!
The class@G u i d  m o r n i n  M r  H a m i l t o n .
Mr Hamilton@It's that time o year again, Burns Nicht!
Mr Hamilton@Rabbie Burns; bard of Ayrshire; the Ploughman Poet.
Mr Hamilton@A naitional traisure.
Mr Hamilton@Ye ken the drill bi noo, ivverie Burns Nicht ilka primary cless haes a competition fur best poyum recital.
Mr Hamilton@There's shoartbreiad an a boattle o ginger fur the winner!
Mr Hamilton@Since yous ur aulder noo, ye get a mair diffeecult poyum fae last year.
Mr Hamilton@This year wi ur learning "Tae a moose".
Mr Hamilton@Burns iz said tae hae scrieved the poyum efter hashing a mooses byke whun he wis oot pleuching the fields, jist afore winter!
Mr Hamilton@Burns' brither claimed he scrieved hit whilst still haudin the pleuch.
Mr Hamilton@Right cless, get lairnin!
Connor@Hawl
Connor@This is shit, I hate that we have to do this every year.
Connor@I mean, I can read some of it, some of those words look familiar.
Connor@Bit at the same time, it just looks wrong.
Mr Hamilton@Glen!
Mr Hamilton@De ye hae somehing to pairt wi the rest o the cless?
Naw, a wisnae talkin.
No, i wasn't talking.
Mr Hamilton@Dinnae tak iz fur bein an eejit.
Mr Hamilton@Dinnae dae it again, or you an Connor wull be seperated.
Mr Hamilton@Back tae studying the poyum.
Mr Hamilton@Excaise iz, say that again?
It wisnae me, a wisnae talkin.
It wasn't me, I was not speaking.
Mr Hamilton@Ur ye gieing me cheek?
Mr Hamilton@A want a wid wi ye, get ootside.
